subject: Investing
title: NFTs Beyond the Hype
description: A 60-second lesson on NFTs Beyond the Hype.

hook.text: A digital artwork sold for $69 million. Then the NFT market crashed 90%. Was it all a bubble?

buildup.text: NFTsâ€”non-fungible tokensâ€”prove unique ownership of a digital item on a blockchain.

discovery.text: Beyond art, NFTs can represent concert tickets, real estate deeds, gaming items, and identity credentials.

twist.text: Most NFT art lost 95% of its value. But NFT technology as proof of ownership continues to grow.

climax.text: Separate the technology (powerful and evolving) from the speculation (usually overpriced and hype-driven).

punchline.text: NFTs prove who owns what. What's worth owning is the harder question.
